name: Extreme Forklifter driving 3D simulator
description:
"Extreme Forklift driving 3D simulator Is Totally Stupidest simulation Game... you Can't Stop Playing". We have always come with challenging game play, with a new turn to the parking arena; we give you the fun and excitement of being a heavy duty Fork Lifter driver. So put on your driving cap and go out on the road to do some damaged car lifting. Pick up crashed cars from the roads that are just standing there as an obstacle. Lift them up with the forks and drive to park them at specified points as indicated by the round arrow. Your job is to clean up the mess created by the garbage cars and wooden boxes carrying different luggage. Be an expert forklift driver and perform the exciting job of picking up wrecked cars and boxes and dropping them off at the indicated spots by circular arrow.
Driving while lifting the cars is complicated as you have to manage the load so the car doesn’t dropped off. Stop the fork lifter at the right position so that the forks can easily pick the load. Pick up the crashed cars and move them out of the way to where they should be.
In most of the parking games available only have you to do one thing... park your vehicle. This game is different. You have to first pick up different transport crates, cars and other cargo to special zones and drop them off.
If you want to experience the adventurous drive of fork lifter then you are at place, just click the GET button to install it in your device and have ultimate fun.
Features:

-It’s absolutely FREE on ios app store!
- The forklifting adventure you've always been dreaming of!
- Experience the glamorous life of a warehouse worker.
-3D city environment with realistic graphics
- Realistic, accurate and highly responsive controls.
- Sequel to the most popular mobile forklift games ever!
- Different camera angles
- Pick damaged cars and wooden boxes up!
- Put damaged cars and wooden boxes down!-
-iOS Optimization: runs perfectly on anything from the original iPad 1 to the latest 5th Generation widescreen devices.

This is the game you never knew you wanted!
